## TransactableMoneyp.unstakeRskSwapTokens() method

Withdraw Uniswap RBTC/BPD LP tokens from liquidity mining.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
unstakeRskSwapTokens(amount: Decimalish): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Amount of LP tokens to withdraw. |
